FuncDef: This command assigns the IP address for the retransmission client on the video interface within the service. The RET client IP address is the originating address used for communication with upstream RET servers. If no RET client address is assigned, the RT client is operationally down as the RET client configuration is incomplete.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address for the retransmission client on the video interface within the service.
